title: Center collapsed chatroom header content on desktop

requirements.summary: Center the collapsed chatroom header inner content horizontally on md+ screens while preserving the existing mobile collapsed layout and leaving the expanded header unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When the header is collapsed and the viewport is md or larger, the collapsed header content (topic + LIVE badge if present + counts + expand button) is visually centered horizontally within the header bar (not left-aligned with extra space to the right).
When the header is collapsed on small screens (below md), the current collapsed header layout and spacing behavior remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the collapsed header layout classes/structure to match expanded-state centering on md+ only (e.g., switch from a simple justify-between row to an md+ centering wrapper that horizontally centers the combined collapsed header content, while keeping the current base/mobile flex layout intact). Ensure the expand button remains accessible and visually part of the centered cluster on desktop, and do not change which elements are rendered.
